name: Hoi Bo

description: Hoi Bo is wearable, natural beauty. Pure and simple. Soft and strong. We make everything ourselves. But it belongs to you – to wear, to use, for days, for years.

description: The Toronto Public Library Foundation is a fundraising organization that enhances the Toronto Public Library’s aspirations to be a world’s leading library, making us all more resilient, more knowledgeable, more connected and more successful.
